scripts.dev-server: cd server/scripts && python create_db.py && cd ../ && python app.py dev_server
scripts.init-server: cd server/scripts && python create_db.py && cd ../ && python app.py
scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "Update changes" && git push origin main
